title: 30-Day Map Challenge
text:
My contributions
I have run through the challenge in the following years. Follow the link on each year for more information!

My contributions to the #30DayMapChallenge. Hoping the list gets longer!


Year
Number of Maps Made




2024
Coming Soon!


2023
30

Reflections
After 30 days of map-making, a few things that came to my mind:

What I gained from the challenge

30 new works of my own!
Mapping skills using R (especially using terra, sf, tidyverse and ggplot2, and rayshader)
New connections with the mapping community!



What I couldnâ€™t do really well

Time. It took time.
Wanted to explore other tools! Especially 3D stuff like Blender or Unity.
Should have gone more into interactive works

Anyway, I survived! Thank you everyone for the tremendous support, engagement, and sharing!

Acknowledgements
This page was created using Quarto on RStudio. The gallery was made using the pixture package.

title: 30-Day Map Challenge
text:
About the Challenge
The #30DayMapChallenge is an online event that takes place every year, where participants create maps for every day on the month of November.
Check out the official website for more details on the challenge!
